title: crawl (prerender): HTML attribute value may contain character reference e.g. `&`
body: ### Describe the bug ```svelte {#each links as href} {href} {/each} ``` This generates ``, which is correct[^1]. During prerender process, `crawl.js` parses HTML by itself and adds `a&b` to its queue. This leads to the following error: ``` $ yarn build yarn run v1.22.19 $ vite build vite v3.1.2 building for production... ✓ 33 modules transformed. vite v3.1.2 building SSR bundle for production... ✓ 45 modules transformed. Generated an empty chunk: "hooks" .svelte-kit/output/server/vite-manifest.json 1.42 KiB .svelte-kit/output/server/index.js 68.06 KiB .svelte-kit/output/server/entries/fallbacks/layout.svelte.js 0.23 KiB .svelte-kit/output/server/entries/pages/_layout.js 0.05 KiB .svelte-kit/output/server/entries/fallbacks/error.svelte.js 1.50 KiB .svelte-kit/output/server/entries/pages/_page.svelte.js 0.37 KiB .svelte-kit/output/server/entries/pages/a_b/_page.svelte.js 0.21 KiB .svelte-kit/output/server/chunks/index.js 3.49 KiB .svelte-kit/output/server/chunks/hooks.js 0.00 KiB Error: Not found: /a&b at resolve (file:///path/to/sveltekit-ampersand-bug-poc/.svelte-kit/output/server/index.js:2013:18) at options.hooks.handle (file:///path/to/sveltekit-ampersand-bug-poc/.svelte-kit/output/server/index.js:2169:59) at respond (file:///path/to/sveltekit-ampersand-bug-poc/.svelte-kit/output/server/index.js:2034:42) file:///path/to/sveltekit-ampersand-bug-poc/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/core/prerender/prerender.js:50 throw new Error(format_error(details, config)); ^ Error: 404 /a&b (linked from /) at file:///path/to/sveltekit-ampersand-bug-poc/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/core/prerender/prerender.js:50:11 at save (file:///path/to/sveltekit-ampersand-bug-poc/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/core/prerender/prerender.js:361:4) at visit (file:///path/to/sveltekit-ampersand-bug-poc/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/core/prerender/prerender.js:232:3) Node.js v18.9.0 [vite-plugin-svelte-kit] Prerendering failed with code 1 error during build: Error: Prerendering failed with code 1 at ChildProcess. (file:///path/to/sveltekit-ampersand-bug-poc/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/exports/vite/index.js:438:15) at ChildProcess.emit (node:events:513:28) at ChildProcess._handle.onexit (node:internal/child_process:291:12) error Command failed with exit code 1. info Visit https://yarnpkg.com/en/docs/cli/run for documentation about this command. ``` ### Reproduction https://github.com/kissge/sveltekit-ampersand-bug-poc/commit/8019cb0a2af6e0b635ac407a57771c0909b74b69 ### Logs _No response_ ### System Info ```shell System: OS: macOS 11.4 CPU: (16) x64 Intel(R) Core(TM) i9-9900K CPU @ 3.60GHz Memory: 77.68 MB / 16.00 GB Shell: 5.8 - /bin/zsh Binaries: Node: 18.9.0 - ~/.nvm/versions/node/v18.9.0/bin/node Yarn: 1.22.19 - /usr/local/bin/yarn npm: 8.19.2 - /usr/local/bin/npm Browsers: Chrome: 105.0.5195.125 Chrome Canary: 108.0.5306.0 Firefox: 101.0.1 Safari: 14.1.1 npmPackages: @sveltejs/adapter-static: next => 1.0.0-next.43 @sveltejs/kit: next => 1.0.0-next.484 svelte: ^3.44.0 => 3.50.1 vite: ^3.1.0 => 3.1.2 ``` ### Severity blocking an upgrade ### Additional Information ~~I'm already working on submitting a PR for fixing this.~~ Submitted #6871. [^1]: https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#attributes-2:~:text=Attribute%20values%20are%20a%20mixture%20of%20text%20and%20character%20references%2C%20except%20with%20the%20additional%20restriction%20that%20the%20text%20cannot%20contain%20an%20ambiguous%20ampersand.
